metadata.title: ELSA-2022-7088:  libksba security update (IMPORTANT)
metadata.description:
[1.3.0-6]
- Fix for CVE-2022-3515 (#2135695)

[1.3.0-5]
- Mass rebuild 2014-01-24

[1.3.0-4]
- Mass rebuild 2013-12-27

[1.3.0-3]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_19_Mass_Rebuild

[1.3.0-2]
- fix multilib conflict in libksba-config

[1.3.0-1]
- new upstream version

[1.2.0-3]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_18_Mass_Rebuild

[1.2.0-2]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_17_Mass_Rebuild

[1.2.0-1]
- new upstream version

[1.0.8-3]
- libksba-devel multilib conflict (#601976)

[1.0.8-2]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_15_Mass_Rebuild

[1.0.8-1]
- libksba-1.0.8

[1.0.7-1]
- new upstream version

[1.0.6-4]
- better (upstreamable) multilib patch
- tighten %files a bit

[1.0.6-3]
- Convert specfile to UTF-8.

[1.0.6-2]
- Rebuilt for https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_12_Mass_Rebuild

[1.0.6-1]
- libksba-1.0.6
- -devel: fix info scriptlet

[1.0.5-2]

[1.0.5-1]
- libksba-1.0.5

[1.0.4-1]
- libksba-1.0.4

[1.0.3-2]
- multiarch conflicts (#342201)

[1.0.3-1]
- libksba-1.0.3

[1.0.2-4]
- respin (gcc43)

[1.0.2-3]
- BR: gawk

[1.0.2-2]
- respin (ppc32, BuildID)
- License: GPLv3

[1.0.2-1]
- libksba-1.0.2

[1.0.1-1]

[1.0.0-1.1]

[1.0.0-1]
